survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of AI-powered fitness coaching apps to evaluate satisfaction, usability, and overall experience with the technology.

questions.question_text: How often do you use an AI-powered fitness coaching app?
questions.client_notes: Consider using a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you use an AI-powered fitness coaching app?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you find most valuable in your AI fitness coach? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily' to 'Once a week' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Multi-select feature allows users to highlight preferred functionalities.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with a maximum of 3 selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you find most valuable in your AI fitness coach? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily' to 'Once a week' in Q1

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the accuracy of your AI fitness coach's recommendations?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Likert scale for consistent measurement across surveys.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons with horizontal layout.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the accuracy of your AI fitness coach's recommendations?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your AI fitness coach?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text input with a 500-character limit.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your AI fitness coach?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your AI fitness coach to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) question; useful for measuring loyalty.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your AI fitness coach to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: Have you ever encountered any technical issues while using your AI fitness coach?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge technical reliability.

script.question_text: Have you ever encountered any technical issues while using your AI fitness coach?

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to Q6, please describe the technical issue you encountered.
questions.client_notes: Optional follow-up to gather specifics on technical problems.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text input with a 300-character limit.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to Q6, please describe the technical issue you encountered.

questions.question_text: Which of the following fitness goals are you using your AI coach for? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select to understand primary use cases.

script.question_text: Which of the following fitness goals are you using your AI coach for? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How does your AI fitness coach compare to working with a human personal trainer?
questions.client_notes: Comparative question to gauge perceived value against human trainers.

script.question_text: How does your AI fitness coach compare to working with a human personal trainer?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in a hybrid model combining AI coaching with occasional live human trainer sessions?
questions.client_notes: Helps assess market potential for hybrid services.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in a hybrid model combining AI coaching with occasional live human trainer sessions?
